mapper.select: SELECT w.deadline_msg gdmsg , s.deadline_msg supmsg FROM wmsl_wssart w LEFT JOIN supplus s ON s.suno = w.sasuno WHERE w.sasuno = #{strItemScode} AND w.saartc = #{strGDCD}
SELECT TOP 1 gasuga , gasug1 , gasug2 , gasug3 , ROUND(((gasug1 + gasug2 + gasug3) / 3)/gasuga , 1) AS fruitsSugar FROM gd_sugar WHERE gagdcd = #{strGDCD} ORDER BY gadate DESC

SELECT b.ppartc , b.ppcode , b.pp01 , b.pp02 , b.pp03 , b.pp04 , b.pp05 , b.pp06 , b.pp07 , b.pp08 , b.pp09 , b.pp10 , b.pp11 , b.pp12 , b.pp13 , b.pp14 , b.pp15 , c.pncode , c.pnname , c.pnitem01 , c.pnitem02 , c.pnitem03 , c.pnitem04 , c.pnitem05 , c.pnitem06 , c.pnitem07 , c.pnitem08 , c.pnitem09 , c.pnitem10 , c.pnitem11 , c.pnitem12 , c.pnitem13 , c.pnitem14 , c.pnitem15 FROM gd_pipn b INNER JOIN gd_pipn_ref c ON b.ppcode = c.pncode WHERE b.ppartc = #{strGDCD}

SELECT CASE WHEN ISNULL(g.dispatchtype, 'I') = 'O' THEN '15' WHEN ISNULL(g.dispatchtype, 'I') = 'I' THEN CASE WHEN g.reserveyn = 'Y' THEN '12' ELSE '11' END END odgubun , ISNULL(g.thedaysyn, 'N') thedaysyn FROM gd_master g WHERE 1=1 AND g.gdcd = #{gdcd} AND g.useyn = 'Y'
SELECT hliname FROM cd_holiday WHERE #{datex} BETWEEN hlidt AND hlidt_to OR DATEADD(D, 1, #{datex}) BETWEEN hlidt AND hlidt_to

SELECT c.rseqno , c.rtype , ISNULL(c.rrseqno,c.rseqno) RRSEQNO , c.rdepth , c.rmemo , c.rwip , c.rwuid , c.rdatex , c.ragree , c.roppose , c.rblind , c.device , ISNULL(c.grade, '3') grade , p.nickn , p.ppath , p.smemo , p.isblogger , m.memname , p.memlevel , CONVERT(VARCHAR , l.orddt, 23) AS orddt FROM productreview c JOIN mb_master m ON c.rwuid = m.memid LEFT JOIN memberprofile p ON c.rwuid = p.memid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT memcd, MAX(orddt) orddt FROM od_header a JOIN od_goods b ON a.ordnum=b.ordnum WHERE a.paystcd IN ('10' ) AND a.orddt >= dateadd(M ,-6, getdate()) AND gdcd = #{strGDCD} GROUP BY memcd ) l ON l.memcd = m.memcd WHERE 1 = 1 AND c.rblind = 'N' AND c.rid = #{reviewId} AND c.ridx = #{strGDCD} AND c.rdatex >= dateadd(M ,-6, getdate()) AND c.rtype = #{reviewType} ORDER BY ISNULL(c.rrseqno, c.rseqno) DESC, c.rdepth, c.rseqno OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT CONVERT(INTEGER ,#{intPagePerItem}) ROWS ONLY
